attributes.action: Lobby Microsoft For A more eco friendly priced Vista for the UK Market
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the release of the new Vista operating software from Microsoft at its current price, it is only set to encourage more unfriendly waste. 

It is more cost effective to purchase new equipment with Vista pre loaded or supplied as OEM thus making more unmanagable computer waste.

A realistic price as per the USA would encourage only software upgrade easing the waste problems we all have.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
